name: VR Escape (Hrishikesh Arun)
description:
VR Escape

My Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

VR Escape is a game where you are stuck in a VR World, To escape VR, The Player has to dodge enemies, invisible platforms and rotating platforms.

It is very hard to complete the game but entirely possible. I hope you will enjoy it!
